name: Sans-Serif for Google+ (2012-05-15)
description: Forces the Google+ font to be Arial, or failing that, sans-serif, always, overriding any settings from the Google+ standard CSS.
additional_info:
Please Note:

If you have issues with this script, please let me know in comments here, or come over to the Google+ thread where I announced this script and comment there.

Version history:

  • 2012-05-15: Initial release to the public.
